content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Boiler at position(-4.5, 23.0)
Consists of a boiler (position -4.5, 23.0) connected to an offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5) via pipes. The boiler is out of fuel and has no fluid present in connections.

### Offshore Pump at position(-7.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5) which is working and connected to the boiler.

### Pipe connections
Includes multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, with some pipes connected to the offshore pump and boiler.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect are within range and that there are no obstacles in between. Move closer to the entities if necessary.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the target position.
